post.body: some1 who understands =D!
@marxy yeah, responded to the wrong 1 of you. blood. meh!
babbling about what? having to give 3 fucking transfusions? i'm complaining!
i would love it if blood could be absorbed thru the skin =P
give @marxy shit! i'm being nice now =P
i loooved my peds rotation at sunrise, loved talking to parents, no matter how fierce. had an offer at summerlin but decided to s ...
yup. med/surg suuucks. we're over-worked cuz our ratios r BS. at least we make more than teachers.
yeah... this unit is NOT what i expected. wish i woulda done peds at summerlin...
it was so smooth this AM. then every fricken doc came in & i got slammed w/ orders!
nice! i get time & 1/2 today & extra 4 hrs for working fri-sat. will help pay off new apt purchases!
meh! work!
yup. finally took a good D.O. to stop throwing short term abx @ me. smoking doesnt help tho =O!
nooo. i was out of work lots. lots of meds. finally had to do 1 mo. long abx trtmnt. have "chronic sinus disease & post nas ...
see also: never too much morphine!
giving narcan cuz doc thinks pt had too much morphine. fucker! new too much morphine!
omg. i think that free xmas lunch went bad =/
i have 3 hrs for 3 transfusions! wtf??!
i'm so sick of being an over-worked nurse... & i havent even done this for a year yet =(
i have to give THREE blood transfusions today & the stupid cleaning lady wont leave me alone!
free xmas lunch from hospital. woo!...
